articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Naval Unit 167
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Naval Unit 167
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected KPA Naval Unit 167 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th regiment.
					 He was greeted by Senior Vice Admiral Kim Myong Sik, KPA naval commander, Rear Admiral Jin Chol Su, commander of the KPA Large Combined Unit 597, Rear Admiral Nam Chon Hak, political commissar of the unit, and other commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 He looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to its history.
					
					 Watching with deep attention the precious historic mementoes and data on a series of visits paid by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to the unit, he looked back with deep emotion on the immortal exploits they performed by setting up the units of submarines and developing them.
					
					 He underscored the need for the unit to let its seamen know well about its history so that they may devote their wisdom and enthusiasm to rounding off the combat preparations with the pride and self-esteem of serving at the post associated with the army leadership exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After watching various indoor trainings including the drill for launching torpedoes at the underwater comprehensive training room, he went round the interior compartments of submarine No. 748 and personally guided the actual drill aboard it.
					
					 He set the course of the submarine to the captain and taught him a good method of navigation, instilled energy and courage to display the spirit of bold attack into its seamen.
					
					 He highly praised the seamen of submarine No. 748 for their successful training.
					
					 The Party Central Committee is attaching great importance to the combined units of submarines, he said, setting forth the tasks to be fulfilled to round off the combat preparations of the unit and remarkably bolster up the underwater operation capability of submarines and modernize and fortify bases.
					
					 He underlined the need to intensify the political and ideological education among seamen so that they may creditably discharge their mission as the death-defying corps of the sea devotedly defending the party and the revolution in operational waters of vast expanse sea far away from the country.
					
					 "It is imperative to organize high-intensity trainings to help the commanding officers raise the naval and underwater operation commanding ability on the basis of studying and rounding off various proposals under the simulated conditions of actual battles," he noted, adding:
					
					 "It is necessary for them to know well about the enemy, to be well informed of the operational waters in which they will operate, and direct efforts to working out reasonable combat proposals by foreseeing any possible circumstance.
					
					 The commanding officers and seamen should clearly see through the motives of the hateful enemies watching for a chance to invade our land and put spurs to combat preparations, thinking about battles only".
					
					 He went round a mess room of the unit and crewmen's quarters and rooms for education of submarine No. 730 to take warm care of their living.
					
					 He instructed commanding officers to provide the seamen with excellent material and cultural living conditions, always remembering the teachings given by the President and Kim Jong Il that supply service precisely means a political work. He took benevolent measures to improve the living of the crewmen of the submarines of the unit.
					
					 He gave pairs of binoculars and automatic rifles to the submarines Nos. 730 and 748 as gifts and had a photo session with their crewmen.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army General Pyon In Son, first deputy chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Operation Bureau.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Stockbreeding Base in Area of Sepho
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Stockbreeding Base in Area of Sepho
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction of the stockbreeding base in the area of Sepho.
					 He went round construction sites of the Stockbreeding Research Institute, the Epizootic Prevention Center and dwelling houses and grass fields created by several units to learn in detail about them.
					
					 There took place a consultative meeting of officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues to build the stockbreeding base in the area of Sepho into a model in the field of stockbreeding in the DPRK and make full preparations for its operation.
					
					 The premier underscored the need to complete the construction of the Stockbreeding Research Institute and the Epizootic Prevention Center before anything to increase the number of domestic animals and increase livestock products in the stockbreeding base.
					
					 Going round the Kosan Fruit Farm and the Ranjong Cooperative Farm in Kosan County, he also underlined the need to glorify the leadership exploits of the party with increased production by improving the fertility of soil and establishing the food production cycle of fruit farming and animal husbandry.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme Prosecutor's Office of the Russian Federation headed by Vice-Director Yuri Gulryagin arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme Prosecutor's Office of the Russian Federation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 Members of the delegation laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them in boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men who made contributions to developing the DPRK-Russia friendly relations and accomplishing the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Reception Given at British Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given at British Embassy
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The British embassy here gave a reception on Monday on the occasion of the official birthday of the queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (national day).
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade O Ryong Chol, Vice-Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Pyong Sik and other officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of different countries and staff members of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 British Ambassador to the DPRK Michael John Gifford and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Service Personnel Touring Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Vow to Continue Marching to Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Service Personnel Touring Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Vow to Continue Marching to Mt. Paektu 
 Samjiyon, June 16 (KCNA) -- The service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) participating in the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu held a meeting in front of the statue of President Kim Il Sung of the Samjiyon Grand Monument on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the members of the study tour group.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of the President and paid tribute to him.
					
					 At the meeting Om Hyang Chol, chairman of the KPA Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that the study tour provided young service personnel with an important opportunity to deeply grasp once again the personality of the President and leader Kim Jong Il as the peerless great men, the revolutionary forerunners' spirit of devotedly defending the leader and their indomitable fighting spirit through their life experience.
					
					  He called on all service personnel to wage a more dynamic struggle for national reunification and the final victory in the cause of accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, enshrining the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu as the eternal lifeline of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Speakers renewed their resolution to firmly prepare themselves as modern day guerrillas of Kim Jong Un, tightly holding arms for devotedly defending the leader and the country in the spirit of Mt. Paektu to fulfill the pledge made in the sacred Paektu plateau and thus continue marching to Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Gives Its Premiere in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Its Premiere in North Phyongan Province
 Kusong, June 16 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus made its performance tour in North Phyongan Province. Its premiere was given in Kusong City on Monday.
					 Among the audience were officials and workers in North Phyongan Province. 
					
					 The performance began with male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army". Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as orchestra and serial songs "Song in Praise of the Sun", female quartet "Our Marshal" and instrumental trio "It Is Pride of Our Party".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying revolutionary exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who showed all loving care and trust for the working class all their lives and provided endless field guidance to their work sites.
					
					 Male solos and choruses "My Blessed Life" and "Voice from My Heart" let the audience bear deep in mind that the history of loving care shown by the Generalissimos is given a steady continuity thanks to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.  
					
					 The performance represented the revolutionary spirit and enthusiasm of the working class turning out in the efforts to implement the Workers' Party of Korea's new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force under the uplifted banner of creating the Korean speed. It ended with male chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only".
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: World Blood Donor Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World Blood Donor Day Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- There took place an event to mark World Blood Donor Day at the National Blood Center under the Ministry of Public Health in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 It was attended by medical workers, voluntary blood donors and employees of the center.
					
					 Also present there were staff members of missions of international organizations here including the acting representative of the WHO mission in the DPRK and the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 The speakers referred to the significance of the World Blood Donor Day and blood transfusion services now under way with the help of the WHO and the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
					
					 They noted that the blood transfusion was an important and essential work for saving people's lives and curing sick people's illness.
					
					 They called for brisk blood transfusion in line with the subject of the WHO this year.
					
					 Voluntary blood donors were presented with souvenirs. 
					
					 After watching a performance given by the art squad of Pyongyang City, the participants looked round photos showing successes made in blood transfusion of the DPRK. They also had sports and amusement games.
					
					 World Blood Donor Day was also marked in provinces that day.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
 Phyongsong, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize opened with due ceremony in Phyongsong, South Phyongan Province on Monday.
					 Present there were Pak Thae Song, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Hyong Bong, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, sports persons and citizens of Phyongsong including youth and students.
					
					 Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there took place women's football matches between South Phyongan Province and North Hwanghae Province and between Kangwon Province and Jagang Province.
					
					 In the period of the contest the players will compete in over 10 events including football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, track and field, judo and weightlifting in Sariwon of North Hwanghae Province, Wonsan of Kangwon Province, etc.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK brought out a new stamp (individual one) to mark the 140th anniversary of the Universal Postal Union and the 40th anniversary of the DPRK's entry into the UPU.
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamp are letters "140th Anniv. of Founding of the Universal Postal Union" and "1874-Juche 103 (2014)" and in the lower part letters "40th Anniv. of the DPRK's Entry into the UPU".
					
					 Pictured in the stamp are a dove with envelop in its beak, a mailman and an old person reading a letter against the UPU mark and earth. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the bureau also published four kinds of individual stamps picturing shellfish and fish.

articles.title: Technological Innovations Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Technological Innovations Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The movement for making technological innovations has proved successful in the DPRK.
					 The Sangwon Cement Complex has made fresh technological innovations like adding an effective auxiliary device to the nozzle of the water injector, as part of its efforts to improve its environment and keep the production going at a high rate.
					
					 The Pothonggang Shoes Factory has developed a speed controller based on frequency converter, making it possible to raise the efficiency of its production process.
					
					 The Sinuiju Essential Foodstuff Factory has computerized all production processes, thus saving labor force by 15 percent and increasing production 1.5 times.
					
					 The Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory has invented various kinds of efficient equipment to put motor production on a normal basis.
					
					 Jong Pu Chan, director of the laboratory in the factory, told KCNA that his factory will make contribution to the building of a thriving nation by producing more trolley buses.

articles.title: New Method of Producing Glucoamylase
articles.content:
New Method of Producing Glucoamylase
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University have completed a new method of producing glucoamylase by culturing fungi with non-grain by-products like rice-chaff and sawdust.
					 Glucoamylase, one of microbial enzymes, is widely used in the field of food industry.
					
					 In the past, Glucoamylase was usually made from grain such as maize or wheat.
					
					 The new method has been proved successful, lowering production costs and cutting down the grain consumption by 50 percent.
					
					 The method was awarded a national invention certificate for its high economic effectiveness.

articles.title: DPRK Will Make No Concession and Compromise: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Make No Concession and Compromise: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers are making much ado as if they are interested in the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula, a foolish scheme to wrest a concession and compromise from the DPRK which bolsters a war deterrence, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The building of an economic power and a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK would be unthinkable apart from bolstering the nuclear force, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The hostile forces are panic-stricken, fearing that if the DPRK achieves economic prosperity, their hostile policy toward it will end in failure.
					
					 The U.S. persistent hostile moves against the DPRK were prompted by its uneasiness that if it does not stifle the latter, it can not put the Asia-Pacific region under its control nor realize its ambition for world domination.
					
					 The imperialists have threatened and blackmailed those countries which tried to increase the defense capability for self-defense and build a nuclear deterrence by dint of military pressure and economic sanctions, and appeased and deceived them, talking about economic aid and restoration of relations.
					
					 The hostile forces should clearly understand that the DPRK is by no means Iraq or Libya. 
					
					 As long as there remain the imperialists on the earth and nuclear threat to the DPRK, its nuclear force is a national treasure which it will never dismantle nor barter for anything.
					
					 The DPRK which codified nuclear possession will make positive efforts to prevent nuclear proliferation, defend the peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world and realize global denuclearization as a responsible nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence can never be subject to political bargaining and economic dealings.
					
					 The U.S. should halt a foolish act of trying to make the strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea a bargaining chip.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges Japan to Honestly Settle Its Past Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges Japan to Honestly Settle Its Past Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery 
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The world public is now becoming evermore vocal censuring Japan's crimes related to the sexual slavery in the past and demanding it settle them.
					 These voices are heard not only from Asian countries but from European countries and even from the U.S., an ally of Japan.
					
					 Some U.S. senators sent an open letter to the U.S. president for the first time, urging him to press for the settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. On June 13 Honda, a member of the U.S House of Representatives, in an article held that the sexual slavery is not an issue of history or that of the Asian region but the one concerning human rights and sexual abuses.
					
					 On June 2 an Asian unity meeting was held in Tokyo as regards the above-said sexual slavery at which a statement was adopted.
					
					 The statement termed the Japanese government and army the arch criminals who set up and operated comfort stations and reduced women there to sexual slaves, adding that the sexual slavery was a grave human rights abuse committed by Japan in violation of the domestic and international laws.
					
					 On June 3 a spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry at a news briefing urged Japan to honestly reflect on its past history of aggression with a clear understanding of it, respect the personality and dignity of the victims of the sexual slavery and reasonably settle the issues left by the relevant history including the comfort women issue in a responsible manner.
					
					 Defying such trend of the international community, the ultra-right conservative forces of Japan are desperately shunning the redemption of its past crimes, still not admitting the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Typical of them is Hashimoto, mayor of Osaka.
					
					 On May 13 last year he talked such rubbish as regards the sexual slavery that "anyone can easily understand that the system of comfort women was necessary for providing rest to nervous soldiers in battlefields under a hail of bullets and shells" and "various other countries in the world had such system of comfort women at that time." 
					
					 His reckless outbursts sparked off strong censure of the public in Japan and abroad. However, he again jabbered on May 13 this year that he would be satisfied as a politician had the people showed even a little understanding of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 These are extremely brazen-faced politically-motivated reckless acts to justify at any cost the sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese government and military in the past.
					
					 The sexual slavery was a hideous crime the Japanese authorities perpetrated in an organized manner after establishing such a system with all state and military powers involved.
					
					 It is a crime to which no statute of limitation is applicable no matter how much water may flow under the bridge. It is a pending issue whose proper solution is demanded by the world public.
					
					 With no rhetoric can Japan conceal the sexual slavery and evade the responsibility for it.
					
					 It is a serious political issue the Japanese authorities should solve and a historic task to be carried out by them without fail.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Strengthening Reunification Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Strengthening Reunification Movement
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Reunification Meeting held a rally in Seoul on June 12 at which they expressed the will to push ahead with the movement for national reunification.
					 At the rally speakers referred to the significance and importance of the June 15 joint declaration, saying that the declaration whose idea is By Our Nation Itself was adopted 55 years since the national division.
					
					 The joint declaration clearly indicates the orientation of the aspiration of the Korean nation for reunification as it recognizes commonness of the south side's proposal by confederal formula and the north side's low-stage proposal by federal formula, they noted.
					
					 They declared that they would organize the vanguard for reunification comprising workers and wage a struggle to strengthen the reunification movement.
					
					 The vanguard will deal a telling blow at the Park Geun Hye's "government" talking about "a great opportunity of unification".

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Slammed for Declaring Criminals Not Guilty
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Slammed for Declaring Criminals Not Guilty
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet prosecution decided not to prosecute Kim Mu Song, lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party" who is the prime mover of the case of opening to the public the minutes of the north-south summit and a confidant of the puppet chief executive, and others. The prosecution also ruled that Nam Jae Jun, former director of the Intelligence Service, So Sang Gi, chairman of the Information Committee of the puppet National Assembly, who illegally opened to the public the original copy of the minutes of the north-south summit and others were free from suspicions. On the contrary, the prosecution imposed heavy penalties on opposition party officials who disclosed the truth about the case.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday terms it a reckless act which can be done only by the Park Geun Hye group engrossed in fascist and arbitrary practices, lost to shame.
					
					 The Park group is a bandit of tricksters cooking up all base political intrigues and a mob of gangsters ignorant of elementary politics, common knowledge of diplomatic affairs and moral principles of the inter-Korean relations, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Such shameless act reminds one of the fascist violence during the "yusin" dictatorial regime which mercilessly eliminated its political rivals, while doing anything to satisfy its greed for power.
					
					 It is too natural that the opposition parties and other people from all walks life in south Korea are calling for the dismissal of the puppet public prosecutor general and the minister of Justice and the introduction of a special inspection of the results of investigation into the suspicious opening to the public of the minutes of the north-south summit, claiming that the recent ruling is the result of contracted, planned and one-sided investigation made by the Park regime and an "unfair investigation which acquitted pro-Park elements".
					
					 We will never pardon the puppet group for unilaterally opening to the public the minutes of the north-south summit to take issue with the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and insult the summit.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Repression Condemned
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Repression Condemned
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- More than 10 000 workers, peasants and poor people of south Korea held a rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on June 13 denouncing the Park Geun Hye puppet group for its human rights abuses, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 At the rally speakers said the policy of aggravating poverty, suppressing workers and obliterating agriculture reflects the horrible theory of placing money before man and this is the cause of the ferry Sewol disaster which took the lives of more than 300 innocent persons, they said.
					
					 They declared that they would fight against the Park regime resorting only to pro-plutocrats policy.
					
					 They demanded the puppet authorities probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster including the investigation into the "president", ensure the right to existence of the evacuees, halt de-nationalization, stop easing regulations, implement the commitment to halve registration fee, probe the truth about interference in the election, punish those responsible, etc.

articles.title: Withdrawal of Nomination of Candidate for PM Demanded by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Nomination of Candidate for PM Demanded by S. Korean Paper 
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on June 13 carried an editorial demanding the withdrawal of the nomination of the candidate for puppet prime minister.
					 The Cabinet reshuffle made by the south Korean authorities is ascribable to the arrogant scheme of Park Geun Hye to let Mun Chang Guk hold the post of "prime minister", the editorial charged.
					
					 According to an opinion poll the majority of the respondents demanded Mun give up the candidacy and such assertion is also heard from the "Saenuri Party", it noted.
					
					 It urged Park withdraw the nomination of the candidate for "prime minister" before it is too late.
					
					 The Association of Buddhist Priests for Realizing Buddhism held a press conference in Seoul that day and demanded Park withdraw the nomination.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in Japan
 Tokyo, June 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- A seminar marking the 14th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration took place in Tokyo on June 13 under the sponsorship of the Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 Present there were Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Japanese Regional Committee, and other members, officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Son in a speech referred to the accusations of the Park Geun Hye regime's "policy toward the north".
					
					 To implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the only way of mending the north-south relations and reunifying the country, he said.
					
					 Then followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers said that the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration was an event specially recorded in the national history as it ushered in a new era of independent reunification.
					
					 The June 15 event common to the nation proposed by the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration failed to take place due to the obstructions of the south Korean authorities, they noted.
					
					 Joint military exercises aimed at invading the north are being ceaselessly staged due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean puppet forces following it, rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula extremely tense, they noted.
					
					 They called for checking and frustrating the anti-DPRK moves of the anti-reunification forces and build a peaceful world.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration reflects the basic principle and way of national reunification, they said, calling upon all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to make every possible effort to usher in the second June 15 era under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Vow to Open New Phase of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Vow to Open New Phase of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
 Tokyo, June 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) issued statements on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the joint declaration is the basis of national reconciliation and unity, starting point of the settlement of the north-south relations and reunification programme common to the nation the validity and vitality of which have been clearly proved in practice.
					
					 He called upon all officials and Koreans in Japan under the headquarters to turn out as one in the nationwide struggle to open a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity, holding high the unfurled banner of By Our Nation Itself, under the leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Hokkaido Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, appealed to all Koreans at home and abroad to get united on the road for national prosperity and valiantly join the sacred struggle for national reunification.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, expressed the will to always take the lead in the struggle to accelerate the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in hearty response to the plan of Kim Jong Un for national reunification.
					
					 Kim Chun Gwon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said: We will turn out as one in the struggle to shatter the moves of the Park Geun Hye group for north-targeted war exercises and confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north and usher in a new phase of national prosperity, peace and reunification.
					
					 Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted: We will more dynamically wage the struggle to implement the north-south joint declaration and thus resolutely smash the moves of the Park group for confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north and dynamically conduct the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Officials of Chongryon Call for Restoring June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
Officials of Chongryon Call for Restoring June 15 Era of Reunification
 Tokyo, June 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said the June 15 joint declaration is displaying its vitality as a great programme for reunification common to the nation thanks to its validity, adding that it serves as a touchstone distinguishing pro-reunification from anti-reunification.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said the validity and vitality of the declaration have already been proved by history. All Korean youth and students in Japan will make dynamic efforts to restore the June 15 era by thoroughly implementing the north-south joint declarations, he added.
					
					 Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Women's Union in Japan, said the resentment at the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea is running high among the Korean women in Japan. 
					
					 She demanded the south Korean authorities immediately rescind the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and honestly implement the joint declarations.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, said the Korean writers and artists in Japan will further intensify their actions to frustrate the confrontation racket kicked up by the Park group against the DPRK and thus open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Kim Hwa Hyo, chairperson of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said all its members would intensify the actions for implementing the joint declarations and thus take the lead in the nation-wide struggle for restoring the June 15 era.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting in Shenyang, China on June 13 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present there were officials of the general association, the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China and the Shenyang branch of the general association and others.
					
					 The full text of the joint declaration was read out at the meeting.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean film.
					
					 A poem and song contest of the general association was held to mark the anniversary of the joint declaration.
					
					 In chorus "June 15 Reunification", chorus "We Are One", solo "Oh, Reunification, oh Reunification" and poem "Let's Defend Our June 15" the performers expressed the will to conduct the reunification movement under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 After the contest Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the general association, made a speech.
					
					 Choe said that the Koreans in China have conducted the dynamic patriotic movement to achieve the prosperity of the nation and the independent reunification of the country in hearty response to the important guidelines drawn up by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for independent national reunification.
					
					 She underscored the need to wage a more vigorous struggle to thoroughly carry out the behests of the Generalissimos for national reunification and preserve and implement the north-south joint declarations under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus bring earlier the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, events were held by regional associations and branches of the general association on the same occasion.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Thongil, the paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, on June 12 carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 It edited a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with Kim Tae Jung, former "president" of south Korea.
					
					 Carried in the paper is the full text of the declaration under the title of "We greet 14th anniversary of north-south joint declaration on June 15."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in South Africa
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A South African committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Mfumalanga Province on June 7.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the career and exploits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Syrian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Syrian Political Party 
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 8. 
					 Adnan Ismail, deputy general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to present a message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of July 8, the anniversary of demise of the President.
					
					 It also decided to give wide publicity to the exploits of the President and hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Syria
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A Syrian committee for remembering HE Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the friendly Korean people, was formed on June 8. 
					 The director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the exploits of the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Bulgarian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Bulgarian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, made public a statement on June 11 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 June 19 this year marks the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK. 
					
					 He developed the WPK into the vanguard unit and the staff of revolution leading to victory the Korean people's efforts to defend the sovereignty of the country and build socialism while guiding the WPK for nearly half a century. 
					
					 He made sure that all the party members, service personnel and people firmly defended Korean socialism and thus instilled the conviction of victory into the world progressives. 
					
					 That is why not only the Korean people but also all other progressives of the world pay noblest respect to him on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the C.C., WPK. 
					
					 We believe that the Korean people would foil the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and certainly win victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the tested leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in booklet by the Grafica Caique publishing house of Peru on June 9.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that in order to successfully accomplish the socialist cause it is necessary to make the ideological work a key priority with a firm hold on it. It also says that the basic task of the ideological work is to imbue the whole society with the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on basis of the principle and method suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 167 de fuerzas navales de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 167 de fuerzas navales de EPC
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad 167 de las fuerzas navales del EPC, galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Le acogieron el coronel general de las fuerzas navales Kim Myong Sik, comandante de las fuerzas navales del EPC, el contralmirante Jin Chol Su, jefe de la gran unidad combinada 597 del EPC, el contralmirante Nam Chon Hak, comisario politico de la unidad, y otros comandantes de la unidad.
					
					Primero, el Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Al ver con atencion los objetos y datos historicos dejados por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en sus reiteradas visitas a la unidad, recordo con emocion las imborrables hazanas de los Generalisimos quienes fundaron y desarrollaron la unidad de submarinos.
					
					Dijo que se debe dar a conocer a los marineros de la unidad la historia de esta para que ellos dediquen su inteligencia y pasion a los preparativos de combate con el orgullo de servir en el puesto donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de direccion militar de los Generalisimos.
					
					Luego de ver en la sala de ejercicios combinados acuaticos los entrenamientos bajo techo incluyendo el de ataque de torpedo, recorrio los compartimientos internos del submarino no. 748 y dirigio a bordo los ejercicios de movimientos practicos.
					
					Al definir la ruta de avance al capitan y ensenarle las habilidades de navegacion, redoblo el coraje de los tripulantes para que manifestaran el espiritu de ataque valiente.
					
					Evaluo que los marineros del submarino no. 748 realizaron bien los ejercicios.
					
					El Comite Central del PTC concede mucha importancia a las unidades combinadas de submarinos, senalo y presento las tareas para ultimar los preparativos de combate de la unidad, aumentar la capacidad de operacion acuatica de los submarinos y modernizar y fortificar la base.
					
					Destaco que se debe intensificar la educacion politica e ideologica a los marineros para que ellos cumplan su mision de cuerpo suicida del mar, que defiende a costa de la vida el partido y la revolucion, aun en los teatros operacionales muy lejos del territorio patrio.
					
					Hay que realizar con intensidad los ejercicios para mejorar la capacidad de los comandantes de organizar y mandar las operaciones navales y acuaticas a base de los proyectos hechos suponiendo el combate de verdad, enseno.
					
					Indico que ellos deben conocer bien a los enemigos y su zona maritima operacional y establecer el racional proyecto de combate previendo las posibles contingencias.
					
					Enfatizo que los comandantes y los marineros deben dar buen impulso a los preparativos de combate teniendo presente la existencia de los enemigos que aguardan la oportunidad para atacar la patria.
					
					Atendio las condiciones de vida de los marineros recorriendo el comedor de la unidad, el cuartel y las salas de educacion del submarino no. 730.
					
					Los comandantes no deben olvidar las instrucciones de los Generalisimos de que el autoabastecimiento para los militares es precisamente la labor politica y garantizar a los marineros magnificas condiciones de la vida cultural y la material, encomendo.
					
					Tomo las medidas para mejorar los niveles de la vida de los tripulantes de submarino de la unidad.
					
					Regalo los binoculos y fusiles automaticos a los submarinos no. 730 y no. 748 y se fotografio junto con sus tripulantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta inspeccion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Pyon In Son, primer subjefe del Estado Mayor General y director de su buro de operaciones.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua detalles de construccion de base ganadera de Sepho
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua detalles de construccion de base ganadera de Sepho 
						
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno la construccion de la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho. 
					Dando vueltas por el instituto de ganaderia, el centro de prevencion veterinaria, el campo de construccion de viviendas y los herbazales formados por varias unidades, hizo conocimiento detallado de la construccion. 
					
					En el terreno se realizo la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					En la ocasion se discutieron las medidas para construir la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho como modelo de la ganaderia coreana y completar los preparativos de operacion. 
					
					El premier dijo que para incrementar las cabezas de ganado y activar la produccion de articulos pecuarios, es necesario terminar con antelacion la construccion del instituto de ganaderia y del centro de prevencion veterinaria. 
					
					Por otra parte, el premier asigno la tarea de mejorar la fertilidad de tierra en la Granja Fruticola de Kosan y en la Granja Cooperativa de Ranjong del distrito de Kosan y establecer el sistema de produccion circular de fruticultura y ganaderia para hacer brillar las proezas de direccion del partido con grandes exitos de produccion.

articles.title: Militares juran continuar la marcha del Paektu
articles.content:
Militares juran continuar la marcha del Paektu 
Samjiyon, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la explanada frente a la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung en el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon el mitin de juramento de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea participantes en el recorrido por los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					Asistieron los funcionarios del Ministerio de Fuerzas Armadas Populares y los miembros del grupo de recorrido. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje postumo al Presidente tras colocar cestos y ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce. 
					
					Presento el informe Om Hyang Chol, presidente del Comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en el EPC. 
					
					El dijo que el presente recorrido sirvio de importante motivo que posibilito a los militares de nueva generacion sentir una vez mas en la practica las nobles personalidades de los Generalisimos y el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider y el indoblegable espiritu de lucha de los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses.
					
					Llamo a todos a luchar con mas vigor por la reunificacion de la patria y por la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria Songun del Juche considerando el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu como eterna linea de vida de la revolucion coreana y apoyando la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Luego, hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores expresaron las decisiones de prepararse como firmes guerrilleros de Kim Jong Un que defienden a riesgo de la vida al lider y la patria y continuar firmemente la marcha del Paektu.

articles.title: Iniciada gira del Coro Estatal Benemerito por la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Iniciada gira del Coro Estatal Benemerito por la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
Kusong, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada la gira artistica del Coro Estatal Benemerito por la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte. 
					Los artistas estrenaron este lunes en la ciudad de Kusong. 
					
					Vieron la funcion los funcionarios y obreros de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte. 
					
					En la escena iniciada con el coro masculino "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea" se pusieron la musica orquestal y la cancion en serie "Himno al Sol", el cuarteto femenino "Nuestro Mariscal", el trio de instrumentos musicales "Es orgullo de nuestro partido", el solo femenino "Tejedora de seda de Nyongbyon", entre otras piezas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron las imborrables proezas revolucionarias de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes en su vida, hicieron todo lo posible por los obreros visitando sin parar sus centros de trabajo. 
					
					El solo y coro masculinos "Mi vida bendita" y "Voz de mi corazon" hicieron sentir a los espectadores que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un continua la historia de los Generalisimos de conceder mucha importancia a la clase obrera. 
					
					La funcion termino con el coro masculino "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal" que refleja el temperamento revolucionario de los obreros coreanos que materializan nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo presentada por el Partido creando la velocidad de Corea. 
					
					Continua la gira.
